text.*:
I've Been Looking For You!!

Chapter Info

Volume:

109

Chapter:

1107

Japanese Title:

あんたを捜してたんだ!!

Romanized Title:

Anta o Sagashitetanda!!

Viz Title:

I've Been Looking For You!!

Pages:

17

Release Date:

February 19, 2024

WSJ Issue:

2024 Issue 12
Chapter Chronology
← Previous Next →
Chapter 1107 is titled "I've Been Looking For You!!".

Contents

  • 1 Cover Page
  • 2 Short Summary
  • 3 Long Summary
  • 4 Quick References
    • 4.1 Chapter Notes
    • 4.2 Characters
  • 5 Author Comment
  • 6 Arc Navigation

Cover Page[]

Cover Page Request: "Bepo pouting after finding Law napping with a snow leopard." by PN Arinko.

Short Summary[]

As the Giant Warrior Pirates begin their attack, Brook and Lilith move out with the Thousand Sunny, while Jinbe heads to Zoro's position, who is stilling facing Rob Lucci. Luffy asks Bonney why she is crying, and she calls him Nika which he does not understand. Luffy then attacks Saturn, while Sanji fights Kizaru. Suddenly Devon and Augur show up, and are surprised to find Saturn, which brings them to state that their mission is now finished. On their way to leave the island, Caribou appears, and implores them to take him with.

Long Summary[]

The giants make landfall as Dorry tells Oimo and Kashii to take the others and swing around the sides, sinking any ships they see and minding the cannon fire. The two giants accept, and the crew branches off with the Marines retaliating back. Usopp sees Dorry and Brogy using a pair of binoculars and is brought to tears by the return of his old friends. Nami picks out Oimo and Kashii among the crowd and deduces they picked up the co-captains from Little Garden, which relieves Usopp as he feared he would not see them in Elbaph. Edison is surprised the Straw Hats know the duo and suspects they heard about the situation from the news that is already circulating regarding this incident.

Realizing they have come to save them, Usopp says they need to finish their preparations to leave. Brook contacts Nami and tells him that they are getting close to their position, but Lilith, knowing they still cannot stop, tells Nami to pay attention to her directions. Elsewhere, Jinbe is still heading for Zoro's position as he is still locked in combat with Lucci. The two have grown exhausted but Lucci tries to emotionally manipulate Zoro by calling him "dead weight," because the crew will not leave without him, so he should just surrender and allow his crew the chance to flee with their lives. Zoro, however, mockingly insults Lucci for thinking he is in control of this fight.

The Marines are informed that roughly thirty of their small-to-medium ships have been destroyed by the Pacifista, and one of the Vice Admirals, named Red King, orders all smaller vessels to pull back and lead with the battleships, which blast at the Pacifista as he mentions what waste it is to destroy their own weapons. Back with Luffy's group, the former asks Bonney why she is crying, and she tells him it is because she had been looking for him for so long. Luffy is confused by what she means but changes the topic to asking about her earlier punch. Bonney asks Luffy to show her how to throw a real punch like he does using Saturn, revealing to him that he harmed Dr. Vegapunk. Saturn angrily says that neither of them have a right to live, but Luffy rejects this and prepares to attack. Saturn hits back first, but Luffy endures and unleashes his Gomu Gomu no Dawn Gatling, blasting Saturn through a building.

Franky tells Bonney to start moving and Bonney tells Dr. Vegapunk that they need to leave now. Dr. Vegapunk, however, tells her that she needs to leave without him because he knows in his condition, he will die if he moves. Kizaru returns and prepares to blast them away, but Sanji deflects his laser attack with his kick. Franky is flabbergasted that Sanji could do such a thing, which he says is thanks to the power of love, prompting an equally just as surprised response from Kizaru. Everyone starts heading for the northeast while Luffy and Sanji stay to handle the Admiral, who says that after this debacle, he should at least return with their severed heads.

As for Saturn, he is confronted by Van Augur and Catarina Devon, the latter of which says how unusual it is for one of the Five Elders to be on the surface. She touches his leg and declares their mission is complete while Saturn asks what they are doing on Egghead, also saying he finds it bizarre that someone from Level 6 would be subordinate to another. Devon's response is that she considers Blackbeard to be special, which Saturn agrees with, along with his lineage, which surprises Devon that he knows. Saturn then asks what the Blackbeard Pirates want out of all of this ruckus they keep making, and Augur simply says they want the world.

Saturn tries to attack the two but Augur warps both of them away with his powers, though they do not get that far as they are still on the island. Nevertheless, the two start leaving but are approached by Caribou, who tells them that he idolizes Blackbeard and set out to sea because of him. As such, he begs them to let him meet him and join his crew.

Quick References[]

Chapter Notes[]

  • The Giant Warrior Pirates, including Oimo and Kashii, make landfall on Egghead.
    • Over thirty Marine Ships have been destroyed by both the Giants and the Pacifista already.
    • Usopp notices them and tearfully concludes they must be here to help.
  • Zoro and Lucci's fight is still ongoing.
  • A crying Bonney refers to Luffy as "Nika", though Luffy has no idea what she means by that.
  • Luffy uses Gomu Gomu no Dawn Gatling and repeatedly punches Saint Saturn, sending him flying across Egghead.
  • Sanji deflects Borsalino's laser beam, much to Kizaru's and Franky's shock.
    • Sanji has activated his genetic augmentations once more.
    • As Franky and Atlas leave with Bonney and Kuma, Sanji and Luffy prepare to fight Kizaru.
    • Vegapunk himself stays behind, stating that moving him with his current injuries would certainly be lethal.
  • Saturn is confronted by Catarina Devon and Van Augur.
    • Devon touches Saturn's leg and declares their mission to be a success.
    • Saturn and Devon both realize that the other is aware of Marshall D. Teach's special lineage.
    • Devon and Augur both declare that the Blackbeard Pirates' ultimate goal is nothing less than "the world".
    • Augur reveals to Devon that he still has trouble teleporting larger distances.
  • Caribou approaches the Blackbeard Pirates to join them, revealing that Teach is his idol.

Author Comment[]


Author Comment
  • Translation
  • Original


The show Moving is great! The more you learn about the character, the more your impressions change. Worth watching.


「ムービング」面白かった。人物の録り下げでどんどん印象が変わって観応えあり。

—Eiichiro Oda
English translation by VIZ Media. For comprehensive translation credits, see here.

'''Chapter 1107''' is titled "I've Been Looking For You!!". 

==Cover Page==
[[Cover Page]] Request: "[[Bepo]] pouting after finding [[Trafalgar D. Water Law|Law]] napping with a snow leopard." by PN Arinko.

==Short Summary==
As the [[Giant Warrior Pirates]] begin their attack, [[Brook]] and [[Vegapunk/Lilith|Lilith]] move out with the [[Thousand Sunny]], while [[Jinbe]] heads to [[Roronoa Zoro|Zoro]]'s position, who is stilling facing [[Rob Lucci]]. [[Monkey D. Luffy|Luffy]] asks [[Jewelry Bonney|Bonney]] why she is crying, and she calls him [[Nika]] which he does not understand. Luffy then attacks [[Jaygarcia Saturn|Saturn]], while [[Sanji]] fights [[Borsalino|Kizaru]]. Suddenly [[Catarina Devon|Devon]] and [[Van Augur|Augur]] show up, and are surprised to find Saturn, which brings them to state that their mission is now finished. On their way to leave the island, [[Caribou]] appears, and implores them to take him with.

==Long Summary==
The giants make landfall as [[Dorry]] tells [[Oimo]] and [[Kashii]] to take the others and swing around the sides, sinking any ships they see and minding the cannon fire. The two giants accept, and the crew branches off with the [[Marines]] retaliating back. [[Usopp]] sees Dorry and [[Brogy]] using a pair of binoculars and is brought to tears by the return of his old friends. [[Nami]] picks out Oimo and Kashii among the crowd and deduces they picked up the co-captains from [[Little Garden]], which relieves Usopp as he feared he would not see them in [[Elbaph]]. [[Vegapunk/Edison|Edison]] is surprised the [[Straw Hat Pirates|Straw Hats]] know the duo and suspects they heard about the situation from the news that is already circulating regarding this incident.

Realizing they have come to save them, Usopp says they need to finish their preparations to leave. [[Brook]] contacts Nami and tells him that they are getting close to their position, but [[Vegapunk/Lilith|Lilith]], knowing they still cannot stop, tells Nami to pay attention to her directions. Elsewhere, [[Jinbe]] is still heading for [[Roronoa Zoro|Zoro]]'s position as he is still locked in combat with [[Rob Lucci|Lucci]]. The two have grown exhausted but Lucci tries to emotionally manipulate Zoro by calling him "dead weight," because the crew will not leave without him, so he should just surrender and allow his crew the chance to flee with their lives. Zoro, however, mockingly insults Lucci for thinking he is in control of this fight.

The Marines are informed that roughly thirty of their small-to-medium ships have been destroyed by the [[Pacifista]], and one of the [[Vice Admiral|Vice Admirals]], named [[Red King]], orders all smaller vessels to pull back and lead with the battleships, which blast at the Pacifista as he mentions what waste it is to destroy their own weapons. Back with [[Monkey D. Luffy|Luffy]]'s group, the former asks [[Jewelry Bonney|Bonney]] why she is crying, and she tells him it is because she had been looking for him for so long. Luffy is confused by what she means but changes the topic to asking about her earlier punch. Bonney asks Luffy to show her how to throw a real punch like he does using [[Jaygarcia Saturn|Saturn]], revealing to him that he harmed [[Vegapunk|Dr. Vegapunk]]. Saturn angrily says that neither of them have a right to live, but Luffy rejects this and prepares to attack. Saturn hits back first, but Luffy endures and unleashes his '''[[Gomu Gomu no Mi/Gear 5 Techniques#Techniques|Gomu Gomu no Dawn Gatling]]''', blasting Saturn through a building.

[[Franky]] tells Bonney to start moving and Bonney tells Dr. Vegapunk that they need to leave now. Dr. Vegapunk, however, tells her that she needs to leave without him because he knows in his condition, he will die if he moves. [[Borsalino|Kizaru]] returns and prepares to blast them away, but [[Sanji]] deflects his laser attack with his kick. Franky is flabbergasted that Sanji could do such a thing, which he says is thanks to the power of love, prompting an equally just as surprised response from Kizaru. Everyone starts heading for the northeast while Luffy and Sanji stay to handle the [[Admiral]], who says that after this debacle, he should at least return with their severed heads.

As for Saturn, he is confronted by [[Van Augur]] and [[Catarina Devon]], the latter of which says how unusual it is for one of the [[Five Elders]] to be on the surface. She touches his leg and declares their mission is complete while Saturn asks what they are doing on [[Egghead]], also saying he finds it bizarre that someone from [[Impel Down|Level 6]] would be subordinate to another. Devon's response is that she considers [[Marshall D. Teach|Blackbeard]] to be special, which Saturn agrees with, along with his lineage, which surprises Devon that he knows. Saturn then asks what the [[Blackbeard Pirates]] want out of all of this ruckus they keep making, and Augur simply says they want the world.

Saturn tries to attack the two but Augur warps both of them away with his powers, though they do not get that far as they are still on the island. Nevertheless, the two start leaving but are approached by [[Caribou]], who tells them that he idolizes Blackbeard and set out to sea because of him. As such, he begs them to let him meet him and join his crew.

==Quick References==
===Chapter Notes===
*The [[Giant Warrior Pirates]], including [[Oimo]] and [[Kashii]], make landfall on [[Egghead]].
**Over thirty [[Marine Ships]] have been destroyed by both the [[Giants]] and the [[Pacifista]] already.
**[[Usopp]] notices them and tearfully concludes they must be here to help.
*[[Roronoa Zoro|Zoro]] and [[Rob Lucci|Lucci]]'s fight is still ongoing.
*A crying [[Jewelry Bonney|Bonney]] refers to [[Monkey D. Luffy|Luffy]] as "[[Nika]]", though Luffy has no idea what she means by that.
*Luffy uses ''Gomu Gomu no Dawn Gatling'' and repeatedly punches [[Jaygarcia Saturn|Saint Saturn]], sending him flying across Egghead.
*[[Sanji]] deflects [[Borsalino]]'s [[Pika Pika no Mi|laser beam]], much to Kizaru's and [[Franky]]'s shock.
**Sanji has activated his [[Modified Humans|genetic augmentations]] once more.
**As Franky and [[Vegapunk/Atlas|Atlas]] leave with Bonney and [[Bartholomew Kuma|Kuma]], Sanji and Luffy prepare to fight Kizaru.
**Vegapunk himself stays behind, stating that moving him with his current injuries would certainly be lethal.

**Saturn and Devon both realize that the other is aware of [[Marshall D. Teach]]'s [[Rocks D. Xebec|special lineage]].
**Devon and Augur both declare that the [[Blackbeard Pirates]]' ultimate goal is nothing less than "the world".
**Augur reveals to Devon that he still has trouble [[Wapu Wapu no Mi|teleporting]] larger distances.
*[[Caribou]] approaches the Blackbeard Pirates to join them, revealing that Teach is his idol.
